name: ARJUN'S BATTLEGROUND
description:
SHOOT MONSTERS AND YOUR FRIENDS IN THIS GAME

COLLECT WEAPONS AND SHOOT

CONTROLS

ARROW KEYS FOR MOVING FORWARD, BACKWARD, LEFT, RIGHT

SPACE BAR FOR JUMPING

LEFT CLICK FOR ATTACK [AFTER COLLECT WEAPONS AND SHOOT]

RIGHT CLICK FOR WEAPON BOP [AFTER COLLECT WEAPONS AND SHOOT]

IF IN OUICKSAND PRESS UP ARROW KEY CONTINUESLY AND SPACEBAR CONTINUESLY  UNTIL YOU GET OUT OF QUICKSAND

TO CUSTOMISE YOUR LOOK PRESS C ON YOUR KEYBOARD

TO PLAY WITH FRIENDS PRESS I ON YOUR KEYBOARD OR PRESS THE INVITE BUTTON
